Topic.Title: What we actually need is a new law that requires all or most law makers

Message.Msg: Term limits for legislators? Not a bad idea. If you're saying they should all be replaced at the same time, I'd disagree. There's a reason why not all Senators come up for election at the same time. The founders meant to provide for a degree of continuity.
